trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um local de qualificado de atividade que corresponde a um evento de usuário no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um designer de atividade ou um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode usar qualquer um dos sobrecarregados <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para instrumentar o fluxo de trabalho para emitir os dados para o infraestrutura como um evento de usuário de controle de tempo de execução.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados emitidos são referidos como dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário dos eventos de status de atividade e eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho, que ocorrem apenas em atividade ou alterações de status do fluxo de trabalho, os eventos de usuário podem ocorrer em qualquer local que é instrumentada em um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Um UserTrackingLocation define os parâmetros correspondentes para tal um local especificando o tipo dos dados de usuário, o tipo da atividade do qual ele deve ser emitido, uma coleção de condições que mais precisamente pode qualificar uma instância ou instâncias dessa atividade, um nome de chave opcional com a qual os dados de usuário devem ser associados, se tipos derivados dos dados do usuário devem ser correspondidos , e se os dados de usuário emitidos de atividades derivadas do tipo da atividade especificada devem ser correspondidos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single UserTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um único UserTrackingLocation pode se referir a mais de um local real no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You may add a UserTrackingLocation to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar um UserTrackingLocation para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para definir os parâmetros de correspondência para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the UserTrackingLocation to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Há três condições gerais que devem ser atendidas na seguinte ordem para UserTrackingLocation para correspondência com a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução: a atividade que foi emitido um evento de usuário deve corresponder ao conjunto de atividades especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; a chave, se existir, associado com o usuário dados devem corresponder <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; e, o tipo de dados do usuário emitidos pelo evento de usuário deve corresponder ao conjunto de tipos de dados do usuário especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the UserTrackingLocation matched.
trans-unit.target: Somente se todos os três das seguintes condições forem atendidos, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução considere o UserTrackingLocation correspondida.

trans-unit.source: To configure a UserTrackingLocation, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um UserTrackingLocation, você deve definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>para especificar o tipo de dados de usuário a ser correspondido e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>para especificar o tipo da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos a ser correspondida.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>para qualificar completamente mais a atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>para especificar que dados de usuário é derivado do tipo de dados de usuário especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>devem ser correspondido, e você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>para especificar os dados do usuário emitidos de atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>devem corresponder.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this UserTrackingLocation.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>para especificar que o usuário somente os dados associados com o nome da chave especificado devem corresponder para este UserTrackingLocation.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>for uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), o estrutura de controle de tempo de execução não tenta corresponder a chave associada com os dados do usuário.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o tipo de dados de usuário para corresponder e o tipo de atividade do qual ele deve ser emitido para corresponder.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, para configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>especificar o tipo de uma atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser correspondido, e você deve explicitamente definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>para especificar o tipo de dados de usuário a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que correspondem aos dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido a partir do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário a ser correspondido para `argumentTypeName`.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>em seu código para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que correspondem aos dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido a partir do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>em seu código para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o nome qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário e o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>da atividade e os dados de usuário.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade for "Código".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário e o tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR dos dados de usuário a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados de usuário e nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>da atividade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade for "Código".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário e o tipo CLR da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>que corresponde a todos os dados de usuário do tipo especificado emitido de atividades do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode qualificar ainda mais o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>definindo suas outras propriedades.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo common language runtime (CLR) da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de atividade de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar ActivityType ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da atividade do qual os dados devem ser emitidos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) da atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo da atividade.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set ActivityTypeName to "Code".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para especificar o nome não qualificado de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>ActivityTypeName "Código" de conjunto de atividades,.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName fornece uma maneira mais fácil para especificar o tipo da atividade que emite os dados de usuário quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName também fornece uma forma independente de versão de referência para o tipo de atividade.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar ActivityTypeName ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>da atividade do qual os dados devem ser emitidos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário a ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de dados do usuário de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar ArgumentType ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário a ser rastreada.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) dos dados do usuário a ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName fornece uma maneira muito mais fácil para especificar o tipo de dados do usuário quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName também fornece uma forma independente de versão de referência para o tipo de dados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar ArgumentTypeName ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>para configurar corretamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do <xref:System.Type>dos dados do usuário.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de condições que são usados para qualificar a atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos para ser rastreada.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar condições para definir com mais precisão a instância do tipo de atividade especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>do qual o evento de usuário deve ser emitido para corresponder à localidade de controle.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você deseja corresponder somente <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>igual a "MyCode", você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>"Código" e adicione uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>às condições que especifica que a propriedade de ID da instância de atividade deve ser igual a "MyCode".</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>condições devem ser verdadeiras para a atividade a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> que é usado para qualificar a atividade do qual os dados de usuário devem ser emitidos.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome com o qual os dados de usuário devem ser associados para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade ou um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>para associar uma chave de cadeia de caracteres com os dados de usuário que são emitidos em um evento de usuário.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of KeyName for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Se o KeyName não é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), a chave associada com os dados do usuário deve corresponder ao valor do nome de chave para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Se o KeyName é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), o controle de tempo de execução infraestrutura não verifica se uma chave correspondente determinar se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>for correspondida.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> chave com a qual os dados de usuário devem estar associados para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> a ser correspondido ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados de usuário devem ser controlados quando ele é emitido de atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade especificado por <> </> *> ou <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados de usuário devem ser controlados quando ele é emitido de atividades derivadas do tipo especificado pelo <> </> *> ou <> </> *>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: O usuário controle local é uma maneira de filtrar dados de usuário controlado.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode filtrar por tipo de dados do usuário controlado especificando o <> </> *> ou <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> valor <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Especifica que os dados de usuário controlado podem ser do tipo ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName ou um tipo derivado de ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*> should be tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados de usuário é derivado do tipo dos dados do usuário especificados por <> </> *> ou <> </> *> devem ser controladas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
